de.malkusch.amazon.ecs

Class SignatureHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.malkusch.amazon.ecs.SignatureHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler<SOAPMessageContext>, SOAPHandler<SOAPMessageContext>

    public class SignatureHandler
extends Object
implements SOAPHandler<SOAPMessageContext>
    SoapHandler for adding the authentication headers to an Amazon Product Advertising API call This SoapHandler generates the signature for the soap call. Amazon's authentication SOAP headers AWSAccessKeyId, Timestamp and Signature will be added to the SOAP-request. This class is thread safe.
    Author:
    Markus Malkusch
    See Also:
    http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSECommerceService/latest/DG/NotUsingWSSecurity.html
